content: On my way to Lie algebras (which are closer than ever), I need to play a lot with ContinuousWithinAt, DifferentiableWithinAt, ContDiffWithinAt, and their manifold friends, and it turns out that their API do not match. I will fix that, and the first step is #17901 which makes the ContinuousOn file more coherent. This should be trivial (just shuffling things around in a file, absolutely no mathematical change).
